attributes.action: We Want David Cameron To Resign
attributes.additional_details: We the people of great Britain have been lied to, let down, walked over, and are being run over by immigrants. All at the very hands of our own prime minister David Cameron. We the people now demand that this man resign. That the position not be passed to someone with the same morals as Mr Cameron. We the people are looking for someone to run this country for us not against us.
